verses.roman:
śivānanda-sena tāṅre kahena vivaraṇa
tomā laite tomāra pitā pāṭhāila daśa jana

synonyms: śivānanda-sena—Śivānanda Sena; tāṅre—unto him; kahena—says; vivarana—description; tomā laite—to take you; tomāra pitā—your father; pāṭhāila—sent; daśa jana—ten men.
translation: He also met Śivānanda Sena, who informed him, "Your father sent ten men to take you away.
